Report Types

Reports

Contact Renewal Reminders

Lists all date based reminders for contacts.

Contacts

Contacts List

List of all basic contacts information.

Contacts

Cost Comparison by Year in Service

Analysis of total vehicle costs per meter (mile/kilometer/hour) based on when in the vehicle's life costs occurred.

Vehicles

Cost/Meter Trend

Analysis of total vehicle costs per meter (mile/kilometer/hour) over time.

Vehicles

Expense Summary

Aggregate expense costs grouped by expense type or vehicle group.

Vehicles

Expenses by Vehicle

Listing of all expense entries by vehicle.

Vehicles

Faults Summary

Listing of summarized fault metrics for particular fault codes and vehicles.

Issues

Fuel Entries by Vehicle

Listing of fuel entries by vehicle.

Fuel

Fuel Summary

Listing of summarized fuel metrics by vehicles.

Fuel

Fuel Summary by Location

Aggregate fuel volume and price data grouped by location and fuel type.

Fuel

Group Changes

List updates to every vehicle's group.

Vehicles

Inspection Failures List

Listing of all failed inspection items.

Inspections

Inspection Schedules

Listing of all inspection schedules.

Inspections

Inspection Submission List

Listing of all inspection submissions.

Inspections

Issues List

Lists basic details of all vehicle-related issues.

Issues

Maintenance Categorization Summary

Aggregate service data grouped by VMRS Category, System, or Reason for Repair Codes.

Service

Operating Costs Summary

Summary of costs associated with vehicles.

Vehicles

Parts by Vehicle

Listing of all parts used on each vehicle.

Parts

Aggregate Service Data breakdown of Scheduled, Non-Scheduled, and Emergency Repairs.

Listing of summarized service history for vehicles.

Listing of all service by vehicle grouped by entry or task.

Service Reminder Compliance

Shows history of completed Service Reminders as On Time/Late.

Lists all service reminders.
